title: Super Bowl XLIII
summary: Super Bowl XLIII was an American football game between the American Football Conference (AFC) champions Pittsburgh Steelers and the National Football Conference (NFC) champions Arizona Cardinals to decide the National Football League (NFL) champion for the 2008 season. The Steelers defeated the Cardinals by the score of 27â€“23. The game was played on February 1, 2009,[8] at the Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, Florida.
